thread.section_title: David Sklar & Associates Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of David Sklar & Associates Inc. | davidsklar.com
thread.title: Julia O.
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Julia O.

author: Julia O.
title: Julia O.
text: We got to the point when we did not know how to proceed to get rid of a big headache. The team at Sclar and Associates were highly professional, we've got our piece of mind after contacting them. They got in touch on our behalf with the creditors, we had to do very little to get our good sleep back. Thank you so much guys, thumbs up!
